vulnerabilities: Information Exposure Through an Error Message
description: The function is vulnerable to Path Traversal (CWE-22) as it uses user input to access files without proper validation. It is also vulnerable to OS Command Injection (CWE-78) as it uses user input to form a command that is executed by the system. Code Injection (CWE-94) is possible as user input is used to form a part of the code without proper sanitization. Information Exposure Through an Error Message (CWE-209) is possible as detailed error messages are printed to the console. Uncontrolled Resource Consumption (CWE-400
